com.pz.reader.structure
Class ColumnMetaData

java.lang.Object
  com.pz.reader.structure.ColumnMetaData
public class ColumnMetaData
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
2.0
Author:
Paul zepernick Holds information about the columns in the data set. This is an improvment over 1.0.x. This information was being repeated for every row, causing a spike in memory usage
